title: Desolate Pages: Careful What You Wish
description: Sixteen year old, Mariel Taylor was tired of being ignored. No one paid her any attention as she struggled to fit in. She believed there was a book somewhere that could teach her how to be popular...as though it were some sort of magic. But, strange things began to occur to everyone around her. she had discovered a book with an enchanting phrase; a phrase that would change everything.No one could explain the sudden apparition of a woman and the mesmerizing words she spoke. But, what did those tantalizing words mean? Soon, Mariel would find herself, along with Mr. Bennington, searching for clues and answers to the mystery of the phantom. What secrets would be revealed in the desolate pages of the phantom's diary?
author: E.M. Elizondo
